name: @prestizni-software/dem-publisher
description: An solution for when making http requests is not a good solution
author: xx0055

scripts.release: npx tsc && xcopy .\dist\AutoUpdateClientManagerClass* ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\dist\AutoUpdatedClientObjectClass* ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\dist\CommonTypes.* ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\dist\AutoUpdateManagerClass* ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\dist\client* ..\client\ /Y && cd ..\client && git pull && npm run release && cd ..\src && xcopy .\dist\AutoUpdatedClientObjectClass* ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\dist\AutoUpdateManagerClass* ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\dist\server* ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\dist\CommonTypes* ..\client\ /Y && xcopy .\dist\AutoUpdateServerManagerClass* ..\server\ /Y && xcopy .\dist\AutoUpdatedServerObjectClass* ..\server\ /Y && cd ..\server && git pull && npm run release
